original_text: Till a dart strike through his liver; as a bird hasteth to the snare, and knoweth not that it is for his life.
korean_text: 필경은 화살이 그 간을 뚫게 되리라 새가 빨리 그물로 들어가되 그의 생명을 잃어버릴 줄을 알지 못함과 같으니라

sentences.original_text: Till a dart strike through his liver;
as a bird hasteth to the snare,
and knoweth not that it is for his life.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 자기 생명을 위한 것인줄 알지 못하도다.
